effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 369,999 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 179,523.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Channel to store 50,429 mana in the Ingenious Mana Battery, up to a max of 201,715. (1 Min Cooldown)

Equip: While your mana is above 50%, gain 837 Versatility, increased by up to 100% by the mana stored in the battery. While your mana is under 50%, siphon 50,429 mana every 5 sec from the Ingenious Mana Battery into your mana pool.

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Dr. Scrapheal to heal your target additionally for 163,685.

When a nearby ally's health falls below 35%, Dr. Scrapheal springs into action, delivering instant care to heal them for 638,097. This effect can only activate once every 1 min.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
